verses.name: Daniel 2:17
verses.text: Then Daniel went to his house, and made the thing known to Hananiah, Mishael, and Azariah, his companions:

verses.name: Daniel 2:18
verses.text: That they would desire mercies of the God of heaven concerning this secret; that Daniel and his fellows should not perish with the rest of the wise men of Babylon.

verses.name: Daniel 2:19
verses.text: Then was the secret revealed unto Daniel in a night vision. Then Daniel blessed the God of heaven.

verses.name: Daniel 2:20
verses.text: Daniel answered and said, Blessed be the name of God for ever and ever: for wisdom and might are his:
